name: ST. GENEVIEVE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist the Ste. Genevieve County Sheriff's Office in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
